煝煝煝

煝字的基本解释

煝
mèi
〔纸煝〕以质粗易燃的纸搓或圆条，供引火之用。
酷热。

煝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèi］
［《廣韻》明祕切，去至，明。］
纸卷。以质粗易燃的纸搓成空心细圆条，供引火、吸烟之用。也叫纸媒儿。

煝字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煝； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页677第17
【廣韻】【集韻】?明祕切，音媚。【玉篇】焃也。【廣韻】炶熱。【集韻】旱熱。　又【集韻】蜜二切，音寐。旱气。

煝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
煝字的起名意思

形容酷热。

flaming
Basic explanation of words
flaming
mèi
〔Paper 煝〕 Use rough and flammable paper or round strips for ignition purposes.
Extremely hot.
flaming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mèi］
["Guangyun" Ming secretly cuts, goes to the end, Ming. ]
Paper roll. Use rough and flammable paper to make hollow thin round strips for ignition and smoking. Also called paper media.
flaming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煝; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 677 Page 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ming and secret, charming sound. [Jade articles] Yan Ye. [Guang Yun] Severe heat. [Jiyun] drought and heat.　[Jiyun] Two cuts of honey, sound sound. Drought.
